cat-dog.png.description: A cat and a dog, sitting on the number line a few points away from one another

hypotenuse.png.description: The coordinate plane, with points labeled (0,4) and (3,0) and a diagonal line segment connecting them to form a right triangle.

4-rt-triangles.png.description: A square, whose sides are each divided into lengths of A and B. The four points where A and B meet on each side define another (smaller) square, whose sides of length C. The parts of the outer square that are outside of the inner square are each right triangles, with side lengths A, B and C.
